snippet: Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, once Russia’s richest man and now a resident of London, dismissed the new charges as politically motivated.
abstract: Russian authorities accuse Mikhail B Khodorkovsky, former oligarch and imprisoned dissident now living in exile in London, of ordering contract murders.
lead_paragraph: Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, once Russia’s richest man and now a resident of London, dismissed the new charges as politically motivated.

headline.main: Murder Charges Filed Against Previously Imprisoned Russian Oligarch
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Russia: New Charges for Ex-Oligarch
